Function: $progress(pos,range,len,char1,.description: FB2K: Creates a progress bar: 'pos' contains position, 'range' contains range, 'len' progress bar length in characters, 'char1' and 'char2' are characters to build progress bar with.

Function: $progress2(pos,range,len,char1.description: FB2K: Creates a progress bar: pos contains position, range contains range, len progress bar length in characters, char1 and char2 are characters to build progress bar with. Produces different appearance than '$progress.'

Function: $replace(str,search1,replace1[.description: FB2K: Replaces all occurrences of string 'search1' in string 'str' with string 'replace1'. Can also be used with an arbitrary number of arguments.

Function $strcmp(str1,str2).description: FB2K: Performs a case-sensitive comparison of the strings str1 and str2.

Function $stripprefix(str).description: FB2K: Removes A and The prefixes from string str.

Function: $peak_to_db(X).description: Converts audio peak value from 0..1 PCM to decibels.

Tag: %genre%.description: Genre of the album specified track belongs to, using 'genre' metadata field.

Tag: %<genre>%.description: Genre of the album specified track belongs to, using 'genre' metadata field.

Tag: %path_sort%.description: Path of the file; for use with sorting, where order of subsongs within a file needs to be preserved.

Tag: %<path_sort>%.description: Path of the file; for use with sorting, where order of subsongs within a file needs to be preserved.

Function: $info(field).description: FB2K: Returns value of technical information field.

Function: $hsl(h1,s1,l1,h2,s2,l2).description: FB2K: Sets the color for text in the HSL color space.

Function: $rgb(r1,g1,b1,r2,g2,b2).description: FB2K: Sets the color for text.

Tag: %_text%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_text>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_selected_text%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_selected_text>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_selected_text_no_focus%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_selected_text_no_focus>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_back%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_back>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_selected_back%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_selected_back>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_selected_back_no_focus%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %<_selected_back_no_focus>%.description: CUI: return the relevant colour before any modifications by the current style script.

Tag: %_display_index%.description: CUI: the current row number in the playlist view (including group headings)

Tag: %<_display_index>%.description: CUI: the current row number in the playlist view (including group headings)

Tag: %_is_group%.description: CUI: whether a group heading is currently being formatted

Tag: %<_is_group>%.description: CUI: whether a group heading is currently being formatted

Tag: %_is_themed%.description: CUI: whether ‘Themed’ has been selected as the scheme for the playlist view in Colours and fonts preferences

Tag: %<_is_themed>%.description: CUI: whether ‘Themed’ has been selected as the scheme for the playlist view in Colours and fonts preferences

Tag: %_system_day%.description: CUI: the current day of the month, as a number

Tag: %<_system_day>%.description: CUI: the current day of the month, as a number

Tag: %_system_month%.description: CUI: the current month of the year, as a number

Tag: %<_system_month>%.description: CUI: the current month of the year, as a number

Tag: %_system_day_of_week%.description: CUI: the current day of the week, as a number

Tag: %<_system_day_of_week>%.description: CUI: the current day of the week, as a number

Tag: %playlist_name%.description: CUI: the name of the active playlist

Tag: %<playlist_name>%.description: CUI: the name of the active playlist

Tag: CUI %title%.description: CUI: the title of the playlist

Tag: CUI %<title>%.description: CUI: the title of the playlist

Tag: %is_locked%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is locked

Tag: %<is_locked>%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is locked

Tag: %lock_name%.description: CUI: the name of the playlist lock, if the playlist is locked

Tag: %<lock_name>%.description: CUI: the name of the playlist lock, if the playlist is locked

Tag: %size%.description: CUI: the number of items in the playlist

Tag: %<size>%.description: CUI: the number of items in the playlist

Tag: CUI %length%.description: CUI: the total length of the items in the playlist

Tag: CUI %<length>%.description: CUI: the total length of the items in the playlist

Tag: CUI %filesize%.description: CUI: the sum of the known file sizes of the items in the playlist

Tag: CUI %<filesize>%.description: CUI: the sum of the known file sizes of the items in the playlist

Tag: %filesize_raw%.description: CUI: the sum of the known file sizes of the items in the playlist, in bytes

Tag: %<filesize_raw>%.description: CUI: the sum of the known file sizes of the items in the playlist, in bytes

Tag: %is_active%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is the active playlist

Tag: %<is_active>%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is the active playlist

Tag: %is_playing%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is playing

Tag: %<is_playing>%.description: CUI: exists if the playlist is playing

Tag: %default_font_face%.description: CUI: the default font family for the panel.

Tag: %<default_font_face>%.description: CUI: the default font family for the panel.

Tag: %default_font_size%.description: CUI: the default font size for the panel, in points.

Tag: %<default_font_size>%.description: CUI: the default font size for the panel, in points.

Function: $set_style(text,text colour,se.description: CUI: Sets the text colour for normal and selected items. Colours are specified using the $rgb() function.

body: \$set_style(${1:text},${2:text colour},${3:selected item text colour},${4:selected item text colour when window is not focused})
Function: $set_style(text,text colour,se.description: CUI: Sets the text colour for normal and selected items. The fourth parameter sets the text colour for selected items when the window is not focuseds.

Function: $set_format().description: CUI: Changes font and text styling for subsequent text.

Function: $set_font(font face,point size.description: CUI: Changes the font used for subsequent text.

Keyword: DURING LAST (plural form).description: FB2K keyword: returns items where time value is contained in the specified period

Keyword: NOT.description: FB2K keywords: returns only items where the expression is false
